verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: And the night as it settles.
verse.verse_3: Your Lord did not abandon you, nor did He forget.
verse.verse_4: The Hereafter is better for you than the First.
verse.verse_5: And your Lord will give you, and you will be satisfied.
verse.verse_6: Did He not find you orphaned, and sheltered you?
verse.verse_7: And found you wandering, and guided you.
verse.verse_8: And found you in need, and enriched you?
verse.verse_9: Therefore, do not mistreat the orphan.
verse.verse_11: But proclaim the blessings of your Lord.
